DOC.brief_summary: The goal clinical protocol perform randomize crossover study determine energy cost hold MedGem® device person 's normal rest metabolic rate ( RMR ) compare hold MedGem® device .
DOC.brief_title: Energy Cost Holding MedGem® Indirect Calorimeter
DOC.detailed_description: Forty ( 40 ) subject randomize two ( 2 ) RMR measurement separate 40-minute rest ( washout ) period . The two RMR evaluation period follow : 1 . RMR MedGem® Indirect Calorimeter 2 . RMR without MedGem® Indirect Calorimeter Study recruitment perform PBRC . Screening , consenting , study procedure perform within single study visit PBRC within Inpatient Unit . All subject introduce ventilate hood determine presence claustrophobia prior enrollment ( i.e. , sign consent form ) .
DOC.criteria: Age 1865 BMI 2540 kg/m2 Diabetes mellitus Current smoker Presently weight loss regimen Medications : diabetes , oral steroid , blood pressure drug , weight loss drug Claustrophobia Pregnant breastfeed Congestive heart failure Chronic kidney disease Pacemaker metal implant
